name: mountainously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very big or high, or like a mountain: The waves were mountainously high. This new construction project is becoming mountainously expensive.
More examplesFewer examplesMy teenage son's dirty clothes were accumulating mountainously on the floor. As he walked round the supermarket, he loaded the trolley mountainously with food.The mountainously indebted club will need a miracle in order to survive.Trucks were laden mountainously with bags and boxes, as people fled the hurricane zone.
